item.name: Archive: Count of archive files
item.description: Collect all metrics from pg_stat_activity https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/monitoring-stats.html#PG-STAT-ARCHIVER-VIEW

item.name: Archive: Count of files in archive_status need to archive
Archive: Count of attempts to archive files
item.description: Collect all metrics from pg_stat_activity https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/monitoring-stats.html#PG-STAT-ARCHIVER-VIEW

item.name: Archive: Count of files need to archive
item.description: Size of files to archive

item.name: PostgreSQL: Get archive
item.description: Collect archive status metrics

item.name: Autovacuum: Count of autovacuum workers
item.description: Number of autovacuum workers.

item.name: Bgwriter: Buffers allocated
item.description: Number of buffers allocated

item.name: Bgwriter: Times a backend execute its own fsync
item.description: Number of times a backend had to execute its own fsync call (normally the background writer handles those even when the backend does its own write)

item.name: Bgwriter: Buffers written directly by a backend
item.description: Number of buffers written directly by a backend

item.name: Checkpoint: Buffers checkpoints written
item.description: Number of buffers written during checkpoints

item.name: Checkpoint: Buffers background written
item.description: Number of buffers written by the background writer

item.name: Checkpoint: Checkpoint write time
item.description: Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are written to disk, in milliseconds

item.name: Checkpoint: Requested
item.description: Number of requested checkpoints that have been performed

item.name: Checkpoint: By timeout
item.description: Number of scheduled checkpoints that have been performed

item.name: Bgwriter: Number of bgwriter stopped
item.description: Number of times the background writer stopped a cleaning scan because it had written too many buffers

item.name: Checkpoint: Checkpoint sync time
item.description: Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are synchronized to disk

item.name: PostgreSQL: Get bgwriter
item.description: https://www.postgresql.org/docs/12/monitoring-stats.html#PG-STAT-BGWRITER-VIEW

item.name: Connections sum: Active
item.description: Total number of connections executing a query

item.name: Connections sum: Disabled
item.description: Total number of disabled connections

item.name: Connections sum: Fastpath function call
item.description: Total number of connections executing a fast-path function

item.name: Connections sum: Idle
item.description: Total number of connections waiting for a new client command

item.name: Connections sum: Idle in transaction
item.description: Total number of connections in a transaction state, but not executing a query

item.name: Connections sum: Idle in transaction (aborted)
item.description: Total number of connections in a transaction state, but not executing a query and one of the statements in the transaction caused an error.

item.name: Connections sum: Prepared
item.description: Total number of prepared transactions https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/sql-prepare-transaction.html

item.name: Connections sum: Total
item.description: Total number of connections

item.name: Connections sum: Total %
item.description: Total number of connections in percentage

trigger.name: Connections sum: Total number of connections is too high (over {$PG.CONN_TOTAL_PCT.MAX.WARN} in 5m)

item.name: Connections sum: Waiting
item.description: Total number of waiting connections https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/monitoring-stats.html#WAIT-EVENT-TABLE

item.name: PostgreSQL: Get connections
item.description: Collect all metrics from pg_stat_activity https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/monitoring-stats.html#PG-STAT-ACTIVITY-VIEW

item.name: Dbstat: Blocks read time
item.description: Time spent reading data file blocks by backends, in milliseconds

item.name: Dbstat: Blocks write time
item.description: Time spent writing data file blocks by backends, in milliseconds

item.name: Dbstat: Hit blocks read
item.description: Number of times disk blocks were found already in the buffer cache

item.name: Dbstat: Disk blocks read
item.description: Number of disk blocks read

item.name: Dbstat: Checksum failures
item.description: Number of data page checksum failures detected (or on a shared object), or NULL if data checksums are not enabled. This metric included in PostgreSQL 12

step.error_handler_params: ZBX_NOTSUPPORTED: Checksum failures metric is supported only in PostgreSQL 12 or higher.

item.name: Dbstat: Conflicts
item.description: Number of queries canceled due to conflicts with recovery. (Conflicts occur only on standby servers; see pg_stat_database_conflicts for details.)

item.name: Dbstat: Deadlocks
item.description: Number of deadlocks detected

item.name: Dbstat: Backends connected
item.description: Number of connected backends

item.name: Dbstat: Number temp bytes
item.description: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries

item.name: Dbstat: Number temp bytes
item.description: Number of temporary files created by queries

item.name: Dbstat: Rows deleted
item.description: Number of rows deleted by queries

item.name: Dbstat: Rows fetched
item.description: Number of rows fetched by queries

item.name: Dbstat: Rows inserted
item.description: Number of rows inserted by queries

item.name: Dbstat: Rows returned
item.description: Number of rows returned by queries

item.name: Dbstat: Rows updated
item.description: Number of rows updated by queries

item.name: Dbstat: Committed transactions
item.description: Number of transactions that have been committed

item.name: Dbstat: Roll backed transactions
item.description: Number of transactions that have been rolled back

item.name: PostgreSQL: Get dbstat sum
item.description: Collect all metrics from pg_stat_database per database https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/monitoring-stats.html#PG-STAT-DATABASE-VIEW

item.name: PostgreSQL: Get dbstat
item.description: Collect all metrics from pg_stat_database per database https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/monitoring-stats.html#PG-STAT-DATABASE-VIEW

item.name: PostgreSQL: Get locks
item.description: Collect all metrics from pg_locks per database https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/explicit-locking.html#LOCKING-TABLES

item.name: PostgreSQL: Age of oldest xid
item.description: Age of oldest xid.

trigger.name: PostgreSQL: Oldest xid is too big

item.name: Replication: Standby count
item.description: Number of standby servers

item.name: Replication: Lag in bytes
item.description: Replication lag with Master in byte.

item.name: Replication: Lag in seconds
item.description: Replication lag with Master in seconds.

item.name: Replication: Recovery role
item.description: Replication role: 1 recovery is still in progress (standby mode), 0 master mode.

item.name: Replication: Status
item.description: Replication status: 0 streaming is down, 1 streaming is up, 2 master mode

item.name: WAL: Segments count
item.description: Number of WAL segments

item.name: PostgreSQL: Get WAL
item.description: Collect WAL metrics

item.name: WAL: Bytes written
item.description: WAL write in bytes

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Database age
item_prototype.description: Database age

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Get bloating tables
item_prototype.description: Number f bloating tables

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Database size
item_prototype.description: Database size

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Disk blocks read per second
item_prototype.description: Time spent reading data file blocks by backends, in milliseconds

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Disk blocks read per second
item_prototype.description: Time spent writing data file blocks by backends, in milliseconds

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Blocks hit per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of times disk blocks were found already in the buffer cache, so that a read was not necessary

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Disk blocks read per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of disk blocks read in this database

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Checksum failures
item_prototype.description: Number of data page checksum failures detected in this database

step.error_handler_params: ZBX_NOTSUPPORTED: Checksum failures metric is supported only in PostgreSQL 12 or higher.

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Detected conflicts per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of queries canceled due to conflicts with recovery in this database

trigger_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Too many recovery conflicts (over {$PG.CONFLICTS.MAX.WARN:"{#DBNAME}"} in 5m)
trigger_prototype.description: The primary and standby servers are in many ways loosely connected. Actions on the primary will have an effect on the standby. As a result, there is potential for negative interactions or conflicts between them. https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/hot-standby.html#HOT-STANDBY-CONFLICT

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Detected deadlocks per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of detected deadlocks in this database

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Backends connected
item_prototype.description: Number of backends currently connected to this database

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Temp_bytes written per second
item_prototype.description: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries in this database

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Temp_files created per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of temporary files created by queries in this database

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Tuples deleted per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of rows deleted by queries in this database

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Tuples fetched per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of rows fetched by queries in this database

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Tuples inserted per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of rows inserted by queries in this database

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Tuples returned per second
item_prototype.description: Number of rows returned by queries in this database

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Tuples updated per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of rows updated by queries in this database

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Commits per second
item_prototype.description: Number of transactions in this database that have been committed

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Rollbacks per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of transactions in this database that have been rolled back

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Num of accessexclusive locks
item_prototype.description: Number of accessexclusive locks for each database

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Num of accessshare locks
item_prototype.description: Number of accessshare locks for each database

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Num of exclusive locks
item_prototype.description: Number of exclusive locks for each database

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Num of rowexclusive locks
item_prototype.description: Number of rowexclusive locks for each database

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Num of rowshare locks
item_prototype.description: Number of rowshare locks for each database

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Num of share locks
item_prototype.description: Number of share locks for each database

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Num of sharerowexclusive locks
item_prototype.description: Number of total sharerowexclusive for each database

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Num of shareupdateexclusive locks
item_prototype.description: Number of shareupdateexclusive locks for each database

item_prototype.name: DB {#DBNAME}: Num of total locks
item_prototype.description: Number of total locks for each database
